Task: Ransack a chest full of junk to find a certain item
Notice a typical secret door or a simple trap
Find a difficult nonmagical trap (rogue only) 1

Search DC: 25 + level of spell used to create trap

Task: 1 Dwarves (even if they are not rogues) can use Search to find traps built into or out of stone.

2 A successful Search check can find a footprint or similar sign of a creature’s passage, but it won’t let
            you find or follow a trail. See the Track feat for the appropriate DC.
